name: Escape the Werewolf
description:
Escape the Werewolf is an entry for the GMTK 2020 game jam! 

You are a werewolf, on the brink of losing control - night is near. Your only objective is to protect your daughter from your werewolvian-counterpart. Use meat, crates, and anything else you can find to barricade or distract yourself before you turn.

This is the fixed version:

https://squeg-inc.itch.io/escape-the-werewolf-fixed
